title: Matchsafe, "Vices Theme, with Woman Smoking", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, with curved sides and corners, featuring raised decoration representing a variety of vices, including woman in profile smoking, the cigarette smoke extending up and around parts of the background, at bottom is long serpent, above on left are playing cards, at center champagne bottle, at right a champagne glass, on lid are 2 racing horses, identical decoration on reverse. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Vices Theme, with Woman Smoking", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-358.
